# palette Demos

## Single Palette Cycle

Single color cycling through a sequence of values (classic water/fire shimmer).

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "wave_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{c1}": "#0066FF", "{c2}": "#0088FF", "{c3}": "#00AAFF", "{c4}": "#00CCFF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "wave", "palette": "wave_pal", "size": [4, 2], "regions": {"c1": {"points": [[0, 0], [0, 1]]}, "c2": {"points": [[1, 0], [1, 1]]}, "c3": {"points": [[2, 0], [2, 1]]}, "c4": {"points": [[3, 0], [3, 1]]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "wave_cycle", "sprite": "wave", "palette_cycle": [{"tokens": ["{c1}", "{c2}", "{c3}", "{c4}"], "duration": 200}]}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="cycle_single">
</div>

## Multiple Independent Cycles

Multiple palette cycles running simultaneously at different speeds (water + fire).

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "dual_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{w1}": "#0066FF", "{w2}": "#0088FF", "{w3}": "#00AAFF", "{f1}": "#FF6600", "{f2}": "#FF8800", "{f3}": "#FFAA00"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "waterfire", "palette": "dual_pal", "size": [6, 2], "regions": {"w1": {"points": [[0, 0], [0, 1]]}, "w2": {"points": [[1, 0], [1, 1]]}, "w3": {"points": [[2, 0], [2, 1]]}, "f1": {"points": [[3, 0], [3, 1]]}, "f2": {"points": [[4, 0], [4, 1]]}, "f3": {"points": [[5, 0], [5, 1]]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "dual_cycle", "sprite": "waterfire", "palette_cycle": [{"tokens": ["{w1}", "{w2}", "{w3}"], "duration": 300}, {"tokens": ["{f1}", "{f2}", "{f3}"], "duration": 200}]}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="cycle_multiple">
</div>

## Cycle Timing Control

Controlling cycle speed with duration field (fast vs slow cycling).

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "timing_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{t1}": "#FF0000", "{t2}": "#00FF00", "{t3}": "#0000FF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "timing_demo", "palette": "timing_pal", "size": [3, 1], "regions": {"t1": {"points": [[0, 0]]}, "t2": {"points": [[1, 0]]}, "t3": {"points": [[2, 0]]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "fast_cycle", "sprite": "timing_demo", "palette_cycle": [{"tokens": ["{t1}", "{t2}", "{t3}"], "duration": 50}]}
{"type": "animation", "name": "slow_cycle", "sprite": "timing_demo", "palette_cycle": [{"tokens": ["{t1}", "{t2}", "{t3}"], "duration": 500}]}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="cycle_timing">
</div>

## Ping-Pong Cycling

Reverse direction cycling using duplicated tokens pattern (forward then backward).

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "glow_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{p1}": "#FF0000", "{p2}": "#FF4400", "{p3}": "#FF8800", "{p4}": "#FFCC00", "{p5}": "#FFFF00"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "glow", "palette": "glow_pal", "size": [1, 1], "regions": {"p1": {"points": [[0, 0]]}}}
{"type": "animation", "name": "ping_pong_glow", "sprite": "glow", "palette_cycle": [{"tokens": ["{p1}", "{p2}", "{p3}", "{p4}", "{p5}", "{p4}", "{p3}", "{p2}"], "duration": 100}]}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="cycle_pingpong">
</div>
